mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainer_details ( user_id, phone, address, gym_name, gym_website, certification_number, certification_image, business_number, introduction, career, instagram_url, is_verified ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{gymName}, #{gymWebsite}, #{certificationNumber}, #{certificationImage}, #{businessNumber}, #{introduction}, #{career}, #{instagramUrl}, #{isVerified} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, phone, address, gym_name, gym_website, certification_number, certification_image, business_number, introduction, career, instagram_url, is_verified FROM trainer_details WHERE user_id = #{userId}
